src_original: atha pratyayopanibandhaḥ--pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśavijñānadhātūnāṃ samavāyādbhavati kāyaḥ /  tatra kāyasya pṛthivīdhātuḥ kāṭhinyaṃ nirvartayati /
abdhātuḥ snehayati kāyam /  tejodhātuḥ kāyasyāśitapīte paripācayati /
vāyudhātuḥ kāyasya śvāsādi karoti /  ākāśadhātuḥ kāyasyāntaḥ suṣirabhāvaṃ karoti /
yastu nāmarūpāṅkuramabhinirvartayati pañcavijñānakāryasaṃyuktaṃ sāsravaṃ ca manovijñānaṃ,
